{{ Infobox person | name= Vusi Thanda | image= | caption= | birth_date= [[September  12 } } ]] 1963  ( 1963 -09-12 } }) (age Mmekọ ngosipụta: Akara edemede a na-amaghị "}")
Vusi Thanda (a mụrụ na 12 Septemba 1963) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na SABC 1 Sitcom Emzini Wezinsizwa dị ka Tshawe
Vusi Thanda bụ onye Xhosa, a mụrụ ya na South Africa.
A họpụtara Thanda na Wall of Fame n'afọ 2017
N'ọnwa Mee 2021, ọ banyere n'ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na Ikhaya Labadala na Netflix.
